U.S. House Bill Seeks Centralized Record of Off-Chain Crypto Transactions https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/09/28/us-house-bill-seeks-centralized-record-of-off-chain-crypto-transactions/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines GQ2LFZ6TCVBYNMXNOUF22WI5F4 Jesse HamiltonIt would be hard for a big exchange to repeat an FTX collapse if the firm’s internal flow of crypto assets was also reported to an outside repository that U.S. regulators could see. That’s the idea behind new legislation from Rep. Don Beyer (D-Va.) that would force exchanges to share the movement of digital assets now only recorded on their own ledgers.
